txt.en:
'I still urge you to come within, but it would seem that you have still had no word of Erkenbrand, Grimbold, or any of the others. What do you wish to do?'

You take your leave of Gamling; you must search the town of Grimslade now, for that is where Grimbold is Thane.

'I wish you a safe journey, [placeholder], and a speedy one at that.'

'Hail, stranger! Do you bring tidings of my husband or the soldiers of Grimslade who have gone missing from the Fords?'\n\nHildith's hopeful stare turns to disappointment quickly enough as you tell her you came to beg for word of the same people.
You have helped the people of Marton, and now it is time to search the town of Grimslade for word of the lords of the Mark.

Grimslade is in the south-eastern reaches of the Westfold.\n\nYou should search Grimslade for someone who may have had word of Grimbold, the Thane of Grimslade, or any of the other lords of the Mark who are missing.
Find someone in Grimslade who might have information
